content.prompt: The excerpt best serves as evidence of which of the following developments for many individuals who amassed great wealth during the period?

choices.label: They came to believe that they had a moral obligation to help improve society to address the needs of the working and middle classes.
They began to resist and disregard the many social conventions and “arbitrary laws” that defined their class.
They sought to escape the undesirable conditions of city living by moving to the countryside.
They attempted to expand middle- and working-class access to political systems by supporting Progressive reforms.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
